item.description: UDMASS CTF Writeup The UMass Cybersecurity Club organized UMassCTF 2025, a global cybersecurity competition featuring challenges in: Web exploitation Cryptography Reverse engineering …and more. This is how I solved some of the challenges! üîç Challenge: Steganography + Cryptography This challenge presented an image filled with multiple QR codes. Step 1: QR Analysis I started by uploading the image to Aperi’Solve üîó https://www.aperisolve.com This revealed: A hash A key Step 2: Vigen√®re Cipher Decryption The hash looked like it was encrypted using the Vigen√®re cipher.
